elements.name: Frage 4
elements.title: Prices and other contractual contents published on the Internet are not ... .
elements.correctAnswer: Prices and other contractual contents published on the Internet are not binding.

elements.name: Frage 5
elements.title: With the ... I as the buyer make the seller (here OHA) a binding offer to buy the laptop for ... as stated in the online store.
elements.correctAnswer: By placing the order, I as the buyer make the seller (in this case OHA) a binding offer to buy the laptop at the price stated in the online store.

elements.name: Frage 6
elements.title: In order for a legally valid contract to be concluded, OHA would have to accept Carla's offer. OHA does not do this!

elements.name: Frage 7
elements.title: If OHA proposes a ... price by e-mail, it is submitting a new binding offer to Carla.
elements.correctAnswer: If OHA proposes a different price by e-mail, it submits a new binding offer to Carla.

elements.name: Frage 8
elements.title: This offer can be made by Carla ... or ... .
elements.correctAnswer: Carla can accept or decline this offer.
